Based on your preference cues, I would recommend "A Christmas Carol". This classic holiday movie is a retelling of Charles Dickens' story. The movie follows the life of Scrooge, a wealthy man who hates Christmas. However, his encounter with Tiny Tim and his subsequent redemption of Christmas are what make this movie such a classic.
Another great option would be "The Mechanic". This movie tells the story of Ender's Game, a military science game developed by the International Military Academy (IMAA) at West Point, New York.
Both movies have a great cast and storyline that will keep you engaged from start to finish.
